headerDisplay: Nuki.io support for Homebridge that supports Nuki Lock and Nuki Opener.

bridge_url.title: Bridge URL
bridge_url.description: The URL of the Nuki bridge.

api_token.title: Bridge API Token
api_token.description: The API Token of the Nuki bridge. Can be configured when setting up the bridge in the Nuki App.

lock_state_mode.title: Lock state mode
lock_state_mode.description: The mode to evaluate lock states. See readme for details.

webhook_server_ip_or_name.title: Webhook server IP/name
webhook_server_ip_or_name.description: The IP or name of the server receiving the webhook (server that is running homebridge).

webhook_port.title: Webhook port
webhook_port.description: The port the webhook server should listen to. Must be free and not the hombridge port.

cache_directory.title: Cache directory
cache_directory.description: The directory where to write the cache. Default is in hombridge storage path '.homebridge-nukiio'. It must point to a valid and empty directory and the user that runs homebridge must have write access.

request_timeout_lockstate.title: Request timeout lock state
request_timeout_lockstate.description: The request time of for requesting lock state.

request_timeout_lockaction.title: Request timeout lock action
request_timeout_lockaction.description: The request time of for requesting lock action.

request_timeout_other.title: Request timeout other
request_timeout_other.description: The request time of for other requests.

lockaction_maxtries.title: Maxiumum retries lock action
lockaction_maxtries.description: The maxiumum retries for lock action.

lockaction_retrydelay.title: Retry delay lock action
lockaction_retrydelay.description: The retry delay for lock action.

add_maintainance_buttons.title: Maintainance buttons
add_maintainance_buttons.description: Add maintainance buttons. If active, than three switches will be added as accessory to do reboot, firmware update, and to refresh all locks states.

id.title: Lock ID
id.description: The ID of the lock. Can be found when calling http://your-nuki-bridge-url/list?token=your-nuki-api-token in a browser.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the lock to use in Homekit.

usesDoorLatch.title: Uses door latch
usesDoorLatch.description: Does your door use a door latch?

usesDoorContactSensor.title: Uses door sesonr
usesDoorContactSensor.description: Does your nuki use a door sensor?

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The priority of the lock. Locks with higher priority {lower number} will be proccessed first.

id.title: Opener ID
id.description: The ID of the opener. Can be found when calling http://your-nuki-bridge-url/list?token=your-nuki-api-token in a browser.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the opener to use in Homekit.

disableRingToOpen.title: Disable RingToOpen
disableRingToOpen.description: Removes lock accessory for setting RingToOpen

disableContinuousMode.title: Disable ContinuousMode
disableContinuousMode.description: Removes lock accessory for setting ContinuousMode

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The priority of the opener. Openers with higher priority {lower number} will be proccessed first.
